thread.title: Great location, very clean
thread.title_full: Great location, very clean - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kruzingtogether
title: Great location, very clean
text:
The Benjamin has great service and really nice public areas. My room was a good size, and everything was very clean. I was on the third floor, which was very loud from street noise, so would recommend requesting a higher floor.
Room Tip: Higher floor to avoid street noise See more room tips
